data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call West New Britain, Papua New Guinea into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West New Britain, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of West New Britain, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 60,768 believers in the state of West New Britain the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of West New Britain, Papua New Guinea that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, English-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, English-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, English-speaking people is yours.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of West New Britain words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of West New Britain, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.focus_label: West New Britain, Papua New Guinea

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in West New Britain, Papua New Guinea to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

location.name: West New Britain
location.full_name: West New Britain, Papua New Guinea
location.people_groups_list: Oganibi, Awun, Ninggera, Negira, Wanap, Kamura
